channel.description: Step up authentication based on access request using ACR Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Step-up authentication using ACR values: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/step-up-authentication/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code. They tend to walk the reader through administrative tasks but not exclusively.
